content: 2 fpdc - one each around the 1st and 2nd fpdc on top of the work 1 chain to make the work a bit more loose round #41 repeat 9 times 24 single_crochet 2 fpdc 1 single_crochet into chain 2 fpdc round #42 repeat 9 times 24 single_crochet 2 fpdc single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #43 repeat 9 times 24 single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet 2 fpdc round #44 repeat 9 times 24 single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet-increase 2 fpdc round #45 repeat 9 times 5 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 12 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 5 single_crochet 2 fpdc skip single_crochet 2 single_crochet skip single_crochet 2 fpdc round #46 repeat 9 times 9 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 6 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 9 single_crochet 2 fpdc 2 single_crochet 2 fpdc round #47 repeat 9 times 28 single_crochet 2 fpdc skip single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 fpdc round #48 repeat 9 times single_crochet-increase 26 single_crochet single_crochet-increase 1 chain 4fpdc-decrease 1 chain round #49 repeat 9 times 30 single_crochet single_crochet-increase into chain single_crochet into 4fpdc-decrease single_crochet-increase into chain round #50 make 9*35=315 single_crochet all around round #51 make slip stitches all around to get a nice edge the end if you make the grey celtic carpet please send me its photo with some details about yourself like your name and where you re from i m curious to know how far my designs travel www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com check out my other carpets http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/p/portfolio html magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com by the way i would publish much more patterns if you all just learned to read crochet diagrams i ve got tons of patterns with diagrams only it takes me more than a week to produce a decent pdf file with written instructions for the pattern and it only takes one hour to draw the diagram it takes about 15 minutes to watch a youtube tutorial on reading crochet diagrams and if you knew how to read diagrams you could make every pattern from around the world without knowing the language this diagram is read from the bottom upwards and from right to left magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com
